mapper.sql: id, committime, traderid, symbol, type, size, price, strategy, status, fok, duration, orderid
mapper.select:
select
from history where symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = "WAITING" and type = "BID" and strategy = "STP" order by price asc

select
from history where symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = "WAITING" and type = "ASK" and strategy = "STP" order by price desc

select
from history where symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = "WAITING" and type = "BID" and strategy = "MIT" order by price desc

select
from history where symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status = "WAITING" and type = "ASK" and strategy = "MIT" order by price asc
mapper.insert: insert into history (id, committime, traderid, symbol, type, size, price, strategy, status, fok, duration, orderid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{committime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{traderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{strategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fok,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update history
committime = #{committime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
traderid = #{traderid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
strategy = #{strategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fok = #{fok,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
duration = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update history set committime = #{committime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, traderid = #{traderid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, strategy = #{strategy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fok = #{fok,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER} orderid = #{orderid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

committime = #{committime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
traderid = #{traderid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
